flawed_nl_solution:
For the night he was able to intake 110 + 310 + 215 = <<110+310+215=635>>635 calories
For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake 560 + 780 = <<560+780=1304>>1304 calories
So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake 1304 + 635 = <<1304+635=1939>>1939 calories
Therefore, he can still intake 2500 - 1939 = <<561=561>>561 calories.
#### 561

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1340, not 1304. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
